creditline: Gift of funds from the Asian Art Council, by exchange
medium: Yue ware Porcelaneous stoneware with modeled and carved lotus motif under green glaze
text: This high-fired stoneware covered with a celadon glaze is typical of the southern family of green ware termed Yue ware. This small, domestic work dates from the last century of the Yue ware tradition.
title: Tripartite Cosmetic Box
